message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Can you consider that?
I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob. I can offer you a deal for $102. It's the best I can do.
I'm not sure I can go as high as $102, but I'm willing to meet you at $99. Can you think about it?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can offer you a deal for $101. It's the best I can do.
I'm not sure I can go as high as $101, but I'm willing to meet you at $98. Can you think about it?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I can offer you a deal for $100.50. It's my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I can only go up to $98. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John for $120.
